entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.5°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
